aiPositioning.positioningText: AI serves as the foundational technology powering every major platform capability through proprietary 6AI engine

businessImpact.summary: AI drives account prioritization, campaign optimization, and seller productivity

aiWhereItShowsUp: 6AI proprietary AI engine powers predictive modeling and account scoring
AI Email Agents automate personalized outreach and meeting booking
Sales Copilot delivers AI-driven account prioritization and research
Generative AI capabilities for ad creative and content generation
AI-powered noise filtering and identity resolution for signal accuracy

summary2Para.para1: Artificial intelligence serves as the foundational technology powering every major platform capability. The proprietary 6AI engine processes massive data volumes, identifies patterns humans couldn't spot manually, and automates decisions that previously required expert judgment.
summary2Para.para2: AI capabilities span predictive modeling, autonomous email agents, sales copilot assistance, generative content creation, and intelligent workflow automation. These features work together to transform raw signals into actionable intelligence that drives revenue outcomes.
